metadata.title: CVE-2020-13164 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.3, 3.0.0 to 3.0.10, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.16, the NFSdissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-nfs.cby preventing excessive recursion, such as for a cycle in the directorygraph on a filesystem.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
